he received honorable award_from the government of_pakistan and life_time achievement_award from_the queen of england
he entered in guinness_book of_world record for the singer of most recorded albums
attaullah_esakhelvi ka_shumar un gine chune artists mein kiya_jata hai jin ki_maqboliyat mutarrif hone se le_kar shohrat ke_urooj tak_pohanchne tak radio tv ya film ke marhoon e minnat nahi hai

jab school teachers ne in ki_awaaz suni_to mukesh aur rafi ke_songs ki_farmaiysh karne_lage aur hausla_afzaai karne ke_sath sath yeh dars bhi dete rehte ke singing_na chorna
wohi un ki_infaradiyat bana

yahin qismat ki devi un par meharban hui aur a rehmat gramophone house a naami aik company_ne un ke_songs ki recording kia a udhar zindagi ka_janaza uthega a aur saraiki geet a naki jae gal tu rus naa ae dhola a choti_si baat par naraz_ho jate ho maahi jab_market mein aae to jaise hulchul mach gai

radio aur tv jo maand parhte sitaron_ki kafalat he nahi_bal ke ubharte hue artists ke hausla_afzaai ki riwayaat bhi rakhte_hain
lekin dosri_taraf village dehaat qasbon buses wagons aur chae khano_mein attaullah_esakhelvi ki_awaaz ka tota bol_raha tha

taweel musafat ke_liye buses ka_ticket lene_wale pehle yeh istafsaar bhi karte ke attaullah_esakhelvi ki cassette lagaoge mianwali ke logon ne inhe bataya_ke tumhare naam se esakhel mein hotel khul gae hain
jagah jagah tumhari taswirein lagi hain aur mianwali mein sirf tumhari cassette he farokht hoti_hai to attaullah_esakhelvi ne phir esakhel jane ka qasd kiya
phir yeh hua ke radio_pakistan ke farmaishi naghmon ke_programs mein log attaullah_esakhelvi ke_songs ki_farmaiysh karte

radio hukkam par bhi is_hawale se dabao dala jata ke wo apni nashriyat mein attaullah_esakhelvi ko madaoo karen aur_aakhirkar majboor ho kar_attaullah esakhelvi se radio_pakistan aane ki darkhuwast karni_parhi
ki dehaai ka yeh wo zamana_tha jab attaullah_esakhelvi aik cassette ki recording ka_muaawza lac rupees liya karte_the
tahum radio_par songs ka_muaawza inhe rupey ka cheque mila jo inho_ne cash nahi karwaya_aur aaj_tak sambhal kar rakha_hua hai
sirf yehi nahi_bal ke radio_par recording se_qabal inhe audition awaaz ki qaulity ka imtehaan kea_mal se bhi guzarna_parha

bushra_ansari received many more different prizes and awards in her life
she received an award of pride_of performance and women life achievement_award from benazir_bhutto
she won_the ptv award and lux style award also
bushra_ansari performed interesting role in the film aabhi to main_jawan hona from geo_tv
yeh beyk_waqt actress singer host comedian and drama nigaar ke taur_par pehchani_jati hain
inka har andaaz munfarid aur har roop judagana hai
sanjeeda acting comedy parody singing hosting_aur ab drama nigari
inho_ne har field_mein apna_loha manwaya hai
jis se in ki do betiyan_hain
intehai masroof aur mashoor fankara hone ke_bawajood inho_ne aik biwi aur maa ka role pori zimmedari se adaa_kiya
bushra apni_family se bohat ziyada attached hain aur fursat ka tamam waqt_ghar walon ke_sath he guzarti hain
career bushra_ansari sirf_saal ki_umer mein he ptv ke children music show kalbon_ki mala ki regular performer ban_gai thin
to farooq qiaser ne inhe apne show kalliyan ke_liye muntakhib_kiya
is ke_ilawa wo show ke_deegar roles ke_liye bhi songs gaya karti_thin
bunyadi_taur par yeh bahon ka show tha lekin ise har_umar ke nazreen barhe shauq se dekha karte_the
bushra ne sab_se pehle iqbal ansari ke aik drama mein acting ke_johar dikhaey
lekin bushra ko sab_se ziyada_shohrat anwar_maqsood ke show shosha se mili
jis mein bushra ne bijli ka role_adaa kar ke meyla loot liya
yeh character itna popular hua ke jab kabhi bushra_ansari kisi show ke_silsile mein beyron e_mulk jati to in se bijli ka character karne ki_farmaiysh ki jati
bushra_ansari ka aik aur aeham show aangan_terha hai jise anwar_maqsood ne likha aur us mein inho_ne shakeel_siddiqui aur saleem_nasir marhoom ke_hamrah yadgar performance di
comedy shows ki bat ho to sab_se pehle ptv ki_tareekh ke maqbool_tareen show fifty fifty ka_naam zehan_mein aata_hai

is show ko maqboliyat ki_bulandiyon tak pohnchane mein jahan ismail tara aur majid jahangir ki lajawab performance ka dakhal_tha to bushra_ansari ne bhi apni parodies ke_zariye is show ko kamiyab_banane mein koi kasar na chori
inho_ne chehre ke tasurrat aur body language ke_zariye in roles mein jaan_daal di

yon to asma_jahangir ki puri zindagi hi amriaat aur insani_haqooq ki khelaf warzion key_khelaf jado_jehad kernay se_ebarat hai aur unki khidmata ka kae bainul_aqwami sithat par_eteraf bhi kea ja_chukka hay lakin un ka taza tareen karnama november se march tak general_pervez musharraf ki amriat ke_khelaf aur bad e_azan chief justics of_pakistan iftikhar_muhammed choudhry ki_bahali ke haq mein chalae janey wali tahreek mein unka numaya hissa hai iss_tehreek mein unki bher pure karkerdagi ka eteraf tamam_halqon ki_taraf se kea_gea magar chief_justice key haq mein tehreek chalaney_ka matleb yea nahin tha key iftikhar_muhammed choudhry un_key kea kisi a moqaddas gaea ki_hasiat ekhtaiar ker jatey yahi_waja hay key jab supreme_court key ful bench ki_taref dey badnama e_zamana nro key_khelaf mukhteser faisla jari kea_gea to iss faislay key baz nikat par apney tahaffuz_ka izhar ker_tey huea unhon_ney iss par tanqeed bhi ki

is dor mein helen_keller bohat mehanti aur hoshiyar shagird sabit_hoi aur bari asani aur josh se us ne ubhri hoi tehriron ko parhna shru kar_diya

rahmat_khan aur torsam_khan ka_irada tha ke woh england_mein aik_achche squash club mein malkana haqooq hasil_ker lein aur wahan jahangir_khan ko bola ker training di_jae take woh australia ke haif hint ki mosalsal perwaz ko rokne ka_bandobast ker sakein
jahangir_khan apne barae bhai_torsam ke khail sey bahot motasir they

rahmet_ne jahangir_khan ko dobara squash kort_mein lane_mein aham_kirdar ada_keya rahmet ko yeh_andaza tha ke jahangir mein khudad salahyatein maujood hain aur umda training aur coatching sey un ke khail mein mazeed nikhar_paida ho_sakta hai

rahmet_ne apne_khandan ke buzurgon aur pakistan inter_national air lines ke ohdedaron ko razi ker_leya ke england jaker hi jahangir woh sare ezazat hasil_ker sakta_hai jis ki sab ko tamanna hai rahmet_khan ko ejazat to mil_gai lakin ajpne mansoobe ko_amli jama pehnane ke_leay unhein do_sal ki_mohlet di_gai

rahmet_khan ne iss challenge ko qabool_ker leya aur apne mishan pewr rawana ho_gae unhein yeh bata_deya gaya_tha ke nakami ki surat mein qaum ka unhein ko kerna pare_ga rahmet_khan ko na jane jahangir mein keya nazar agaya_tha ke woh shooru sey hi pur umeed dekhai dete they

aur theek do_sal bad woh khab haqeeqat mein tabdeel_ho gaya woh mission kamyab raha jis per rahmet_khan rawana huey_they november torsam_khan ka_inteqal hua_tha aur november_ko jahangir_ne canada ke shaher toronto mein jaif_hint ko hara_ker nae almi champion banne ka_ejaz hasil_keya

simi_final mein jahangir_ne hadayat jahan ko shikst di_thi jabke hint ne doosre simi_final mein faqmer zaman ko haraya tha sala_hint world_open mein naqabil taskher chale_arahe they_aur sey hone_wale iss_tournament mein har_bar fateh lout rahe_they

hint ne pehla_game sey jeeta magar minut tek chalne wale iss game_sey andaza hone_laga tha ke jahangir hathyar dalne ke mood mein nazar_nahein ate minut_ke taweel dauranya wale_pehle game mein hi sala_hint ko tawaqat sey_zayada jaddo jahed karna pari thi

sala jahangir_ne hint_ko itna zayada pehle hi game mein thaka deya_tha ke un ki tawanai mein kami nazar ane lagi_thi hint apne_harifon ko thaka ker harane_mein mashhoor they_lakin iss roze woh_khud shikar_ho rahe_they yeh umda mansooba bandi_ka nateja tha jahangir_ne pehla_game iss andaz mein khela_tha ke usey zayada sey_zayada lamba keya_ja sake
jahangir apni shason mein kamyab_rahe aur_agle teen game sirf minut_ke ander jeet leay iss_tarah hint ki_kamyabyon ka_silsila khatam hua aur un ki jaga aik_naujawan pakistani ne le_li

aur yahan se aik ahad ki shuruat huein aenda panch salon_tek jahangir_khan ko iss_dunia ka koi bhi khelari hara na_saka iss_dauran unhon_ne sey_zayada matches khele_aur har_martaba kamyabi_hasil ki yeh aisa_record hai jis ki misal squash mein to keya kisi aur khail mein bhi nahein milti
iss_zamane mein jahangir ke_khelaf aik match to keya aik game ya sirf_aik point hasil_kerna bhi un ke hareef ke_leay fakhar ki bat samjhi_jati thi

november mein newzi land ke roos norman ne woh karnama anjam_deya jis mein guzashta panch_sal sey bzayada arsa mein har aik_nakam raha_tha norman kai_martaba jahangir sey shikast_kha rahe_they lakin ke world_open final_mein squash ki_dunia ka azeem_tareen khelari zair ho hi gaya
jahangir_ne chand hi dino bad norman ko kai moqablon_mein hara_ker world_open ki shikast ka_badla le_leya aur apni kamyabton ka_silsila jari_rakha

london hi mein training hasil_karne wale pakistani naujawan jansher_khan mein squash ki ufaq per ubhre_aur jahangir_khan ke_leay aik sakht khan hareef sabit huey jansher ke_bare bhai mohibbullah_khan junior bhi aik_achche khelari_they jinhon_ne ka british_open final khela_tha

jansherbhi bila_shuba aik_azeem khelari_they un ka_moqabla jahangir_khan ke_sath martaba hua ke world_open final tak dono baraber yani matches jeete they akhri moqabla jansher_ne jeeta_iss tarah un ke_darmeyan record ho_gaya
jahangir ki retirement_ke baad almi_satah per jansher pakistan ki wahid umeed hua kerte_they jansher_ne apne weaqt ke behtareen_khelaryon ko mosalsal harate rahe aur khud shazonadir hara kerte_they
bradman ke des australia ke_mayanaaz batsman bakamaal fielder aur bemisaal captain ricky_ponting ko naqadeen aur shaiyqeen har lihaaz_se aik lajawaab cricketer tasleem karte_hain
in ka_shumar apne_mulk he nahi duniya ke kamiyab_tareen captains mein hota_hai
wo captain kya banea in ki bating aur bhi ziyada karari ho_gai
jis ka khamyaza mukhalif_team ke bowlers ko bhugatna parhta_hai
ricky duniya ke iklote batsman_hain jinho_ne martaba aik calendar saal ke_dauran test_matches mein se_zaiyd runs_score kiye
ricky_ponting ki qiyadat mein a yellow shirts a_new dobara world_cup jeeta
inho_ne test centuries banai hain aur is muaamley mein sirf sachin_tendulkar se_piche hain
ricky_ponting ko one_day cricket mein australia ki_taraf se sab_se ziyada_runs aur centuries banane_ke aezaaz_hasil hai
ricky_ponting mein_wisden leading cricketer in the_world aur mein_wisden cricket of_the year ka aezaaz_bhi hasil_kar chuke_hain
december_ko australia ki riyasat tasmania ke area launceston mein aankh kholne wale ricky thomas ponting_ko apni_salahiyaton ka_loha manwane_ke liye ziyada intezar nahi karna_parha
inho_ne mein sirf_baras ki umar_mein he one dau ben_ul aqwami matches aur test_matches ka apna khata khol liya_tha
in ka daur_e urooj us_waqt shuru_hua jab mein inhe kangaroos ke one_day squad aur phir saal_bad he test_team ka bhi captain bana_diya gaya

aedaad_o shumar ke aaiyne mein dekha jae to_ricky ponting test_matches mein_centuries aur half centuries ki_madad se runs_bana chuke_hain test_matches mein in ka oasat hai jab ke one_day international_matches mein inho_ne ke oasat_se runs_score kiye_hain

candidates ki list khasi taweel hai aur is mein steve waugh ellen barden sachin_tendulkar aur brian_lara jaise bohat se shohra aafaaq batsman shamil_hain lekin aedaad_o shumar ricky_ponting ke haq mein gawahi dete_hain
hashim ko bachpen se hi squash se dilchaspi_thi
khail ka talent un mein shooru se hi maujood_tha aur achchey khelaryon mein shoomar keye jate_they
apni aala salahyaton ki_bunyad per hashi khan ko british air_force mein bahasyat squash_coach faiz kiya_gaya tha
mein pehli_mertaba munaqid_hone wali pakistan professional squash champion_ship ke_final mein sala hashim_khan ne sala raushan khan ko_shikast di
un mushkil_halat mein bhi hashim_khan ne_squash se apna rishta nahein tora aur sakht jaddo_jahad kerte rahe
hashim_khan ko apni_salahyaton ka_andaza us_waqt hua jab unke rishtedar abdul_bari ke british_open final_mein pahonche
chand hi salon_mein hashim ke khail ka_meyar buland ho_chukka tha_lakin unhein uska ihsas nahein_tha
hashim_khan iss baat se_bakhubi waqif thay ke un ka khail abdul_bari se kafi behter hai
mein pakistan_air force ke officers ne chanda jama ker ke hashim ki british_open champion_ship mein shirket ke_liye england_rawana kiya
yeh intehai hairer ki baat thi ke woh players khelari jise apne_watan mein khelne ki tamam sahooltein mayasser nahein thein duniya ke number aik no one khelari_player ko harane_mein kamyab ho_gaya
lakin_hashim khan ke khail mein josh tha woh walwala tha aur sub se barh ker woh jazba tha jis se woh apne hum_asar khelaryon ko zair kerne ki maharat_rakhte thay
apne ala_khail se hashim_khan ne poori dunia ko hairat mein dal_diya tha
tek_woh british_open mein na_qabil e taskheer rahe yani yeh_title woh mertaba lagatar jeete
ke_final mein unhein roshan_khan ne shikast_di lakin mein hashim_khan aik_mertaba phir sukhuru huye
iss_tarah hashim_khan satween mertaba time british_open jeetne_mein kamyab_huye jo aik_naya record tha
woh apne_daur ke azeem_tareen khelari samjhe_jate thay
saal ki_umer mein bhi woh aik_naujawan khelari ko farig kerne ki salahiyat_rakhte thay
hashim_khan ke khail ke ahem khubi yeh thi ke woh kisi bhi lamha himmat nahein harte thay
kaha_jata hai ke unhon_ne squash mein kayi new shorts ijaad kiye

hashim_khan ka short jo sab_se zaida mashoor huwa aur jo dekhne se_taluq rakhta_tha woh four hand cross kort drop_short tha jis ke_zariye hashim_khan ne na_sirf apne hareefon ko bikheir ker rakh_diya tha balke uss se hashim_khan ne motadid points hasil_kiye thay
roshan_khan iss_azeem tareen_khelari ke_walid hain jis ne iss khelon ko naya andaz diya
roshan_khan ke sahebzade jahangir_khan ka_nam squash ki_tareekh mein sunahre hooroof se likha_jata hai
roshan_khan khud bhi apne_daur ke aik behtareen_khelari thay
roshan aur hashim pakistan ke ibtedai dino ke do super_star thay
unko shikst de ker_roshan ne ye sabit_ker diya_tha ke squash hi misr ki_bartari ikhtetam ki_taraf gamzen_hai

misr_ke mahmood_alkareem ko ke dunlop open ke_final mein hara_ker roshan_khan ne_apne roshan mustaqbil ki naweed sunayi thi mahmood char_martaba british_open title_jeet chuke_thay aur apne waqt ke ala_tareen khelari_player mane_jate thay
roshan_khan bari jawan merdi se hashim_khan ka_moqabla kerte_thay
kayi tournament ke_final mein hashim ke haton_shikst khane ke baad roshan_khan ne akhir_kar ke british_open final_mein hashim_khan ko zair ker hi deya
iss_tarah roshan_khan british_open ka_izaz hasil_kerne wale doosre pakistani_khelari ban_gaye
mahreen ne iss series ko world_champion ship series qarar_diya tha

mein hashim_khan aur roshan ne australia and_new zealand ka_daura kiya un dono ko wahan aik series khelne ke liya madu_kiya gaya_tha ta ke unka khail dekh_ker maqami khelari apne khail mein nikhar_paida karein teen matchon ki series roshan_khan ne se jeet_li thi
iss_tarah ye roshan ke_liye aik_bahot bari kamyabi thai
cricket ki duniya ne ab_tak jo azeem_tareen player paida kiye in mein brian_lara top_of the_list hain

lara_ne college ke tournament school boy league mein_runs fee innings ki oasat_se runs banae jab wo saal ke the to inhe_pehli baar naujawan players mein_shamil kiya_gaya aur_under ki_numaiydegi karne ka_mauqa mila brian_lara trinidad and tobago mein football aur table tennis bhi khela karte_the magar in ka_khayal tha ke cricket in ki kamiyabi ka_raasta hai jo inho_ne sach kar dikhaya
inhe_cricket ki duniya_mein the prince bhi kaha_jata hai
brian_lara aik aise_batsman hain jis ke gunn cricket ki duniya ke shaiqeen aur cricketers sab he gaate hain
in ki salahiyaton_ko dekhte_hue inhe sir dawn bradman jawed miandad sir lan hatton sir_garry sobers sunil berry richards aur sachin_tendulkar jaise mayanaz batsman ki_suff mein_shamil kiya_jata hai
inho_ne west_indies ki nakaam hoti hui team ko sambhala aur is ki kamiyabi ke_liye sara bojh apne kandhon_par utha_liya
multan test_mein inho_ne jarihana_andaaz se bating ki aur kisi bowler se riayat na karte_hue double century score ki jise sab yaad_rakhenge
brian_lara ne test_matches mein_runs score_kiye wo test_matches mein sab_se ziyada_runs banane_ke aitebar se duniya_mein th number_par hain
inho_ne aik_roza matches_mein innings_khel kar
wo munfarid aur barhe records ke maalik hain
roza_cricket mein kae martaba sab_se barhi inferadi innings_khel kar_aalmi record_bana chuke_hain

sir_garry sobers ke runs ka saal_tak aalmi_record bana raha_tha brian_lara ne mein england ke_khilaaf runs_bana ka rise bhi torh_diya phir australian batsman mathew haddon ne saal_bad mein_zimbabwe ke_khilaaf runs_bana kar in se yeh_aezaaz cheen liya lekin brian_lara ne sirf months ke_bad he aik_shandar innings england ke_khilaaf khel_kar runs_bana kar dobara new record_qaiym kar_diya
yeh roza test_match mein kisi bhi cricketer ka ab_tak sab_se barha score hai
brian_lara ko first_class cricket mein yeh_aezaaz bhi hasil hai ke wo aik he innings_mein runs_banane wale_wahid batman ban_gae
yeh_aezaaz inho_ne mein kashair county ke_liye khelte_hue sabiq pakistani cricketers haneef mohammad ka record_torh kar hasil_kiya
cricket ki duniya par_raaj karne_wale brian_lara sehar angaiz bating mein to kamiyab_rahe magar west_indian team ki captainship in ke_liye masla bani_rahi
baar in ko team ki qiyadat saunpi_gai us_dauran inho_ne aik_roza cricket matches_mein se jeete haarey aur baghair_kisi natije ke khatam hue

in ke retirement_ke faisley par sabiq west_indies fast_bowler wesley hall ne afsoos ka_izhaar kiya joel garner aur michael holding ne_kaha ke brian_lara aik ache khiladi hain in ki is salahiyat se faida_uthaya ja_sakta hai aur west_indian bating ki_bartari barqarar_rakhne au_rise aage_barhane mein madad mil sakti hai
azam_khan bare mehnati aur housla wale khelari_thay
azam_khan mein yeh khoobi maujood thi ke woh apne hareef ko jald_hi qaboo_pane ki salahyat rakhte they
lekin se azam_khan ki_kamyabyon aur kamranyon ka daur shooru huwa who char_martaba mosalsal british_open title_jeetne mein kamyab_huye jo aik bahat bara_karnama tha
ke britsh open_final mein unhon_ne apne cousin roshan_khan ko chand minutes_mein hi ura deya_tha

saiqeen ye samajh rahe thea ke_final bahat sakht aur_sansani khaeez hoga keyon ke do aala paye ke khelari players aik doosre ke_madd e_moqabil thay dono aik aik_mertaba british_open jeet_chuke thay aur aik_bahot hi kante dar final ke tawaqqa thi
cort mein maujood shaiqeen ko us_waqt zaberdast hairat hue jab sirf chan minutes_mein azam_khan ne match_jeet liya
naujawan mohibullah_ne apne tajurba kar mamoon ke_khelaf lajawab khail ka_mozahra kiya
panchween_aur faisla_kun set mein azam_khan ko bahat iehteyat beratna pari aur apne tamam tajurbe ko barue kar lana para
azam ne yeh match_jeet ker_british open_title ki hit trick mokammal ker_li
tawaqat ke_motabiq yeh match bhi dilchasp aur_sansani khaiz raha dono khelari_palyer jarhana andaz apnate rahe aur shaiqeen ala_khail seylutf andoze hote_rahe
yeh moqabla bhi akhir tak dilchasp raha aur tareekh ne_apne app_ko dohraya yani panchween_aur faisla_kun set mein azam_khan aik_martaba phir bazi ley gaye
azam_khan aik phurteele khelari_they aur hashim_khan jaise_azeem khelari_palyer bhi un se sanbhal_kar khela kerte_thay
british_open ke_elawa deeger bainul_aqwami moqablon international squash competitions mein bhi azam_khan ne kayi ahem kamyabyan hasil_kein
khush tabaa khush zauq aur khush libaas wasim_akram ne aesa cricket khela hai jis ki shaiyqeen ko khuwahish thi
ball poar jadooi giraft se inhe rafter aur swing ko qaboo karne ka hairat_angez fun aata_hai
aik he_action mein fast speed se wicket ke dono taraf_ball karne ka fun
swing ke sultan ko duniya ke azeem_tareen bowlers ki list_mein shamil karta_hai
jab ke inho_ne one_day matches_mein kul wickets apne_naam ki hain
one_day mein in ki behtareen_karkardegi mein karachi mein_zimbabwe ke_khilaaf kit_hi

ke cricket_world cup ke_final mein in ki tabahkun bowling aur ghomte hue yorkers ne aik_taraf to mukhalif_team ki kamar torh_di to_dosri taraf inhe_cricket ke shaiyqeen mein gher_mamoli maqboliyat dila_di
inho_ne khud ko mutadid baar imran_khan ka haqeeqi jaan_nasheen sabit_kiya aur kae matches_mein pakistan ki_numaiydegi ke_sath captain ke_faraiyz bhi anjaam_diye
lekin is se in ki karkardegi_mein koi_farq nahi_aaya
inho_ne fast bowling mein wo khobsurti paida ki
jo is se_pehle dekhne mein nahi_aai thi
yaqinan yeh_baat koi nahi_janta hoga ke june_ko lahore mein paida_hone wala yeh ladka aik_din duniya e cricket ka sab_se ziyada_tabahkun bowler sabit hoga
inhe bhi cricket se_lagao ho_gaya aur wasim baras ki_umer mein apne school ki team ke bowling aur bating opener the
saal ki_umer mein school ki team ke captain ban_gae
in ki gher_mamooli karkardegi ne maqami kalbon_ki tawajja_hasil kar lit_hi

ludhiana club ki_taraf se inho_ne lahore gym khana ke_khilaf behtareen_karkardegi ka_muzahira karte_hue rameez_raja aur intekhab aalam samait players ko out kiya_jis par inhe_cricket board ke talent camp ke_liye muntakhib kar_liya gaya
jab in ki_umer baras_hui to in ki a in swinger balls a ki shohrat hone_lagi aur inho_ne fast baller khan mohammad ki_tawajja hasil_kar li

javed_miandad wasim_akram ki bowling dekh_kar bohat_mutassir hue aur inhe ke zor dene par_wasim akram ko new_zealand ke_khilaaf patterns eleven ke roza match ke_liye team ke players mein_shamil kar_liya gaya jis ke_bad mein inhe_new zealand_ke khilaf_faisalabad mein hone_wale aik_roza international match ke_liye team mein muntakhib_kiya gaya
phir inhe_new zealand_ke tour ke_liye bhi nominate_kiya gaya
wasim_akram one_day cricket mein ziyada khush nazar_aate hain jahan wo duniya ke behtareen_all rounder kehlae
tahum aisa nahi hai ke wo sirf one_day ke he player the_bal ke test_cricket mein bhi in ki_maqboliyat ka graph tezi_se bulandi ko chu gaya_tha
a ki series_mein adelaide test_mein inho_ne imran_khan ke_sath bating_karte hue qaumi_team ko yaqeeni shikast se bacha_liya tha
ke_bad inhe_cricket ki duniya ka sab_se ziyada tez aur sab_se ziyada_tabahkun bowler qarar_diya jane_laga
ke wolrd cup mein wo qaumi_team ko final tak na_qabil e shikast le_gae lekin final_mein pakistan ko australia se shikast hui
tahum yeh ilzaam sabit_na ho_saka
taqriban dehaaiyon par_mushtamil career mein wasim_akram kar records bhi apne_naam kar_chuke hain
wasim_akram pehle bowler hain_jinho ne yeh hadaf hasil_kiya hai
inhe baar test_matches mein aur bar one_day mein a man_of the match a muntakhib_kiya gaya hai
jab ke inho_ne test_mein aur one_day mein bhi hat ricks ki hain
wasim_akram apne_career ke_urooj mein har aik ki_tawajja ka_markaz the
aaj_kal wo mukhtalif channels_par commentary aur ipl_mein kolkata_knight riders ke coach ke_faraiyz anjaam_de rahe_hain
mein wasim_akram ki mulaqat australian khatoon shaniera thompson se hui aur baras_bad wo shaniera ke_sath shadi ke bandhan mein bandh gae
wasim_akram pukhta iradon ke malik hain
in ek iradon ki_pukhtagi ka_andaza is_baat se lagaya_ja sakta_hai ke baras ki_umer mein he in ki diabetes ki tashkhees ho_gait hi
is ke_bawajood na_sirf yeh ke inho_ne apne khel ko mutassir_nahi hone diya bal_ke wo apni_fitness barqarar rakh_kar amlan diabetes ko ab_tak shikast dete aa rahe_hain
agar yeh kaha_jae ke wasim_akram un logon ke_liye hausle ki_misaal hain jo apni bemari ki_wajah se_mayoos ho_jate hain to ghalat na hoga
cricketer ki hasiyat_se intikhab_alam ne bowling batting aur captain mein esa kuch_khas zaror kiya hai jo_tarikh mein un ka_naam zindah rakhne ko kafi hai
retirement_ke bad wo coach aur manager_ke tor_par quami team ka tawil hissa rahe aur is sare dor mein pakistan ne bohat_si yadgar fatohat hasil_kein jin_mein numayan tar ke worldcup mein kamyabi hai
pakistan_cricket board mein unche oddon par_faiz rahe sar_e dast director domestic cricket hain
test cap hasil_kar lene_par bowler ki_khuwahish hoti_hai bas jald azjald apna_phela wicket_hasil kar le
is tago do mein bazon ko khasa kasht katna parta_hai magar_baz thori kawish ke_bad manzil sar kar_lete hain
in sorton se hat_kar test_cricket tarikh_mein qismat ke dhani ese guzre_hain jinhon_ne apni_pheli bowl_par hi batsman ko thikane laga diya
intikhab_alam pakistan ki_taraf ke test double karne_wale phele cricketer hain yani wickets aur runs_banane wale
mein pakistan ne new_zealand ko us ki sarzamen par zer kiya to is_tarikhi fatah mein_intikhab alam_ne wickets_le kar bunyadi kirdar_ada kiya
batting mein bhi kai_bar kare waqat mein team ki ayanat ko aaye
mein oval test_mein asif_iqbal ke_sath mil_kar nawen_th wicket ki_sharakat mein_runs jor kar alami_record banaya jo saal qaim_raha
first_class cricket mein bhi intikhab_alam ke cricket ka sitara khub chamka
county cricket mein_intikhab alam ke_johar khub khule
mein sire county saal_bad county champion bani to us mein_intikhab alam ki umdah bowling ka bhi dakhal_tha
mein middle sixes ke phel batsmanon ko pavilion ki rah dikhai nawan th bhi un ka_shikar ban_jata agar robin jackman jihon ne akhiri khilari_out kiye un ki bowl_par aasan catch na gira dete
badazan ye match mein century karne mein kamyab howe is_leye agar wo innings_mein wickets_hasil kar pate to munfarid record ke malik ban_jate
pakistan_cricket team ke captain ki_hesiyat se un ki_khidmat ko nazar_andaz nahi kiya_ja sakta
abdul_hafeez kardar ki retirement_ke bad pakistani_cricket mein banjar dor aaya aur ki dihai mein humari karkardagi dawan dol rahi
is_arse mein england ke aik dore mein hum aik sires se hare to_dosri mein o se
in dosron ke_bad pakistani_team ne jo dere kiya in mein_intikhab alam ki catnaini mein behtareen karkardagi ka_muzahirah kiya
mein edgbaston test_mein jab pakistan ki jeet yaqeni dekhai de rahi_thi barish england ki_madad ko aan pohanchi lords test_mein jeet ke qareeb aakar naqis_batting ke_bais jeta match runs se har gaye

phir mein america ki socialist party ne khawateen_women ke_masail hal_karne ke_leye women_national commission banaya jis ne khawateen_women ke almi_din ke_leye sifarishat mauratab kein ta ke khawateen_women ke haq e ray dahi ke_leye aik munazam muhim ka_aghaz kiya_jaye

social democratic woman society ne march_ko new_york mein_khawateen ke_hoqoq ke_leye aik ijlas munaqed_kiya jis ke_nateje mein american socialist community ne mein february ke_akhiri hafte mein_khawateen ka alami din manane_ka elan kar_deya

socialist khawateen ne aur mein_khawateen ke aki ijlas munaqid_kiye aur women_national commission ne mein_socialist national_congress ko sifarish pesh ki ke february ke_akhiri itwar sunday ko khawateen_women ka almi_din qarar_deya jaye
phir august mein copan hagan mein_socialist conference_munaqid ki gayi jis mein tajwiz de_gayi ke is din ko almi_satah par bhi khawateen ka din_qarar diya_jaye
conference ke_doran ye tajwiz manzor kar_li gai aur is_tarah khawateen ka almi_din wajod mein agaya
mein russia ki khawateen ne_apne hoqoq manwane_ke leye gharon aur factoryon se sarkon_par akar aik pur_josh muzahira_kiya
is_tarikhi waqeye ne khawateen ki duniya badal di
is muzahire ke_bad peter grad mein hartaal hoi aur khawateen_women ka ye ahtejaj is had_tak phel_gaya ke aik hafte ke andar zar nicolas dom medan chor_kar bhagne par_majbor ho_gaya
almi_satah par rosi khawateen ki is jurat ko_saraha gaya aur russia_mein march_ko khawateen ka din_qarar de_diya gaya

ki_dehai ke akhir mein_khawateen ki tehrikon mein aik_naya ubhar aaya to march_ko almi_yom e khawateen ke tor_par manane_ka mutalba aik pur zor tehrik ki shakal mein samne_aaya aur socialist mumalik ke_sath un mimalik mein bhi march_ko khawateen ke din ke tor_par manaya jane lag ajahan ye din dosri tarikon ko manaya_jata tha
shuru mein_socialist paas e_manzar ke_bais america ki_taraf se is tajwiz ki_mukhalfat ki jati rahi tahum mein wahan bhi march_ko khawateen ka din tasleem kar_leya gaya
se tak khawateen ki char almi conferences munaqid hoein jin ka_maqsad duniya_bhar ki khawateen ki numaindagan ko aik plate_form par akhatta kar ke un ke_masail ki nishan dahi karna tha
in conferences mein_khawateen ke infaradi masailse le_kar almi_satah tak ke_masail par tafsil se giftogo ki gai aur sifarishat par_mushtamil elamiye bhi jari keye_gaye
ye naya musawida e qanon mustaqbil_mein pakistan mein khatoon ke muqam aur hoqoq ke taiyon mein bunyadi ahmiyat ka_hamil hia

taqseem_hind ke kuch_arsey bad wo shadi kar ke pakistan aa_gai aur phir yahan inho_ne radio film aur tv ke_liye apni_awaaz ka jadoo_jagaya
jab film walon ne iqbal_bano ki classical awaaz_suni to in se rujoo kiya aur film ke_liye gaane ki_baqaida dawat_di
tab aik sadabahar geet ne_janam liya
tu laakh chale ri gori tham tham k film gumnaam ke is geet ke_bad aik aur maqbool_tareen geet iqbal_bano ki_awaaz se jawidaan hua
ulfat kin ae manzil ko chala tu bahein daal ke baahon mein anwar_kamal pasha_ki in_dono films ki kamiyabi mein iqbal_bano ki_awaaz ka bohat dakhal_tha

isi_liye inho_ne films_mein kam gaya lekin khob gaya
iqbal_bano ne film ke_liye kae khobsurat aur yaadgar naghme gaae
jin ka_shumar sadabahar geeton mein hota_hai
film ishq_laila ke geeton ne to har taraf dhoom_macha di_thi

sitaron tum to sou jao paresha an raat sari hai sapaid rangat aur dilkash naqosh ki malik iqbal_bano ka ghazal aur thumri gaane ka apna_khas andaaz tha jo inhe deegar gaane walon se mumtaz karta_tha
rasio par iqbal_bano ne usatza ki ghazlen gaane ko_tarjeeh di
yun_to iqbal_bano ne barhe_barhe shoara ka kalaam gaya magar mayanaz poet faiz_ahmed faiz ki_nazmon aur_ghazlon ko inho_ne is kamaal maharat ke_sath gaya ke sunne_walon par sehar taari_ho jata_tha
faiz ki is_famous nazam ko iqbal_bano ne khud he compose_kiya aur itne khobsurat o dilkash_andaaz mein gaya ke in ke naam ko zinda rakhne ke_liye yehi kafi hai
dasht e tanhai_mein ae jaan e jahan larza an hain teri aaghosh ke saaey tere honton ke saraab phir faiz_ahmed faiz ki aik aur maqbool_aam nazam

hum dekhenge lazim_hai ke hum bhi dekhenge jab takht giraae jaenge jab taaj uchale jaenge in_nazmon ko apni_khobsurat aur munfarid awaaz mein gaa kar iqbal_bano ne amar kar_diya aur khud bhi amar_ho gai
daagh dil hum ko yaad aane lage log apne diye jalane lage is ko iqbal_bano ne itne dilkash_andaaz mein gaya ke is mein chaar chand laga diye
iqbal_bano ka aik yaadgar musical concert jaipur_mein hua_tha jab wo saarc ke_tehat saqafti wafood ke tabadley ke_hawale se pehli_baar india gai_thin
jaipur_mein bohat_barha auditorium tha october ka month tha sardi thin a garmi barha acha mausam tha
ab ke saawan ghar aa_ja mera gana jari tha ke achanak barish ki boondein parhna shuru ho_gai

nasir_iqbal is_waqat pakistan ke un chand khilariyon mein se aik hain_jin se mustaqbil_mein achi umeeden wabasta hain
wo pakistan squash ki_tarikh ke_wahid khilari_hain jinein british_open junior ki under_championship jetne ka_ezaz hasil hai

unhein england_mein hone_wale london_open aur malaysia_mein hone_wale royal_cup ka title_jeetne ka_ezaz bhi hasil hai

baras ki umar_mein jab_inho ne_apne barey_mein khud faisle karne shuru_kiye to inho_ne is_haqiqat ka bhi_saamna kiya ke musalsal koshishon ke_bawajood wo piano_bajane mein itni maharat_hasil nahi kar sakin ke inhe a professional pianist a qarar_diya ja_sake chunache pianist banne ka_khayal dil se nikaal kar inho_ne shobaa siyasiyat ka_rukh kar_liya
tahum bad mein barhe paimane par_tabahi phelane wale hathiyar baraamad na hone par condoleezza_rice ko zabardast tanqeed_ka saamna_karna parha

condoleezza_rice par is_hawale se bhi tanqeed ki jati_hai ke inho_ne he america ke_khilaaf sargarmiyon_mein mulawwis alqaida ke_arkaan ke_khilaaf a water boarding a jaise azziyat rasani ke jadeed aur mohlik tariqe istemal_karne ki tajveez bush administration se manzoor_karai thi

condoleezza_rice ke khayalat ke tanazur_mein in ka_shumar america ke qadamat_pasand aur riwayaat pasand logon mein kiya_ja sakta_hai maslan george_bush ki sadarti mohim ke_dauran wo aelania kaha karti_thi ke a isqaat_hamal a par_pabandi aaiyd honi_chahiye
rice_ne isqaat_hamal ke_khilaaf mohim chalane wale logon aur tanzeemon ko fund dene ki_himayat karte_hue kaha_tha
condoleezza_rice ko awaiyl umer_mein apni a siyah_rangat a ke_baiys nasli imtiaz ke waqeyaat ka bhi_saamna karna_parha tha

mein karachi mein peoples_party ki_bunyad bacha_khan ne rakhi lakin_iss se_pashter ke iss nauzaidah jamat ka dhancah khara hota june mein griftar_ker liye gaye
january_mein reha keye_gaye to soba_sarhad mein_dakhla aur naqlo harkat ki azadi na thi
lakin one unit bana aur phir khan_abdul ghaffar_khan aur doctor_khan sahib ke_raste juda hogaye
june mein apney bhai doctor_khan sahab hi ki wazarat aala ke_zamane mein griftar_ker liye gaye
baghawat aur inteshar phelane ilzam mein moqadmat_qaim huay
january_mein rahai_pai to national awami party banai october_mein mashalla nafiz_hua to masaibka key daur ka_agaz hua
aur ka darmeyani arsa khan_abdul ghaffar_khan ney jailon aur jila_watni mein guzara
dekha_jaye to unki pori_zindagi hi jail ke chakker katte huye guzer gae
se tak koi ais arsa na tha jab app mosalsal teen saalon tak_jail se_bahar rahe_hon
khan_abdul ghaffar_khan ne national_congress ki hamnawai mein do qaumi nazere musalmanon ke judagana tashkhus aur qiyam_pakistan ko kabhi tasleem nahein_kiya
qiyam_pakistan ke_sath hi pakhtunistan ke daye ho_gae
mein kabul chale_gaye wahan se al india_radio kabul per apni taqreron zareye se pakistan ki_mokhalfat aur pakhtunistan qaim ki tahreek chalai
jab russian afwaj ne afghanistan_per hamla_kiya to unhon_ne afghan mojahideen ki bhi hemayat nahein ki

agarchay khan_abdul ghaffar_khan zindagi phar apne pakistani hone se inkari rahey aur pakistan ko aik aghulama reyasat qarar detey rahey yahi_waja hai key unhon_ney dafan hone ke_leye afghanistan ki aazada sarzamine ka_intekhab kiya iss hawale_se unhein iss kitab mein_shamil nahein_kiya jana_chahiye tha

may mein momin shahi key halqa se qaumi_assembly key_rukun chuney gae june ki hizb_e ikhtelaf key leader muntakhib huae september_ko pakistan democratic party ke leader baney march_ko sadar_yahya khan_ne sheikh_mujibur rahman ko jo ke awami league ka sarbarah thay mashriqi_pakistan mein qaumi_assembly ki nishashton seats mein se nishashtain seats hasil ki thin ghair ioni qarar_de dia aur sheikh_mujibur rahman ko griftar arrest kar_liya iss waja_se yeh_hamaray azli dushman bharat se ja mila
yani bharti afwaj ko sheikh_mujibur rahman ki hami mosllah tanzeem mukti bahini ka mokammal tawun hasil tha
april_ko all_india radio ne khaber nashar ki ke amashriqi pakistan mein azad hukumat ke_qayam ka_alan kar_diya gaya hai
bharat ko ruse aur bartania ki mukammal hamayat aur madad hasil thi
november_ko bharat ki bari fauj_ne mashriqi_pakistan par hamla kar dia

november tak mashriqi_pakistan mein jangi halat bahut kharab_ho gaye to sadar_yahya khan_ne majburan bangali rehnuma nurul_amin ko aburi daur ke lia_wazir azam namzad_kar deye aur unke_sath zulfiqar_ali bhutto ko naib wazir_azam aur wazir_e kharja bana_diya
december_ko saqoot e dhaka ka saneha huwa
pakistan ke do tukrey hojaney ka nurul_amin ko be_inteha sadma huwa
iss_moqa par unhon_ne kaha akash allah_tala mujhey pakistan ke iss almiya se_pehley hi iss duniya se utha letaa
october_ko nurul_amin inteqal_kar gaye
pir_pagara ki ibtedai_zindagi mushkil_halaat mein guzri
wo abhi saal ke the ke in ke_walid syed sabghat ullah shah ko angrez_hukomat ne hurriyat pasandi ke jurm_mein giriftar kar_liya

is ke_bad inho_ne hur jamat ko_angrezon ke_khilaf munazzam kiya_jis par angrez_hukomat ne inhe baghi qarar_de kar march_ko hyderabad jail_mein phansi de_di aur in ke jasd_e khaki ko virsa ke_hawale karne ke_bajae ghayab kar_diya
pir jo goth mein in ke aabaai ghar kangri_house aur atraaf ke makanon aur aabaadi ko bombing se tabah_kar diya_gaya
is ke_ilawa in ke_mureedon ko jo hur kehlate the barhi tadad mein phansiyan di_gai
us_dauran pir_pagara ki rohani gaddi ko hamesha ke_liye khatam_karne ki_sazish bhi ki gai ta ke is khitte mein azaadi ka_naam lene_wala koi baqi na rahe
yehi_wajah hai ke march se february tak kangri_house mein takht pagara par koi pir muajood nahi tha

walid ki_phansi ke_bad sikander ali_shah ko in ke_chote bhai aur khandan ke_deegar afraad ke_sath kuch_arsey bandar_road ma_jinnah road ke aik bungalow mein nazar_band rakha_gaya aur wahan se aligarh muntaqil_kar diya_gaya
in ki pesh goiyan aur siyasi tabsarey news papers namak mirch laga kar shaey karte_the

marshal_law ke_khatme ke_bad yeh jamhoriyat ki_janib pehli peshraft thi_jis se bad mein aam_intekhabaat ki_raah hamwar hui aur jis ke_natije mein pakistan muslim_league aur peoples_party ki hukomatein qaiym hui thin_aur mohammad khan junejo miyan mohammad nawaz_sharif aur benazir_bhutto ko wazarat uzma ke mansab tak_pohanchne ka_mauqa mila tha

october_mein chohdri muhammad anwar bhander speaker maghribi_pakistan ne_governor maghribi_pakistan nawab of kala bhag malik ameer muhammad khan ko sifarish kar ke unhen additional section judge muqarar_kar deya
us commotion ne general_asif nawaz jinjuwa ki_muat ko fitri qarar_diya jab ke_bad mein ye baat sabit_hoi ke unhen zahar deya_gaya tha
august mein high_court ne muhammad nawaz_sharif ki factories seal aur par excise ka imla mutayan kar_deya
is_fasle ko unhon_ne kaladam_qarar de_deya

december_ko ayein ke article g ke_tehat qayam muqam chief election commissioner justice mukhtar ahmed junejo ne_unhen na ehel qarar_dete hoye khazat e naamzadgi mustarad_kar deye kyun_ke un par ilzam tha ke june_ko haft rozah jaridah atakbeera karachi ko aik_interview dete_hoye fakhar un nisa judge lahore high_court par badunwani ke ilzamat legaye aur nizam_e adal par baat_cheet karte_hoye kaha ke anizam e_adal ki bunyadi kharabi ye hai ken a to ise islami nizam_e adal ke usolon par istawar kiya_gaya aur na hi angreez ke nizam_e adal_ki khubiyon se arastah rehne deye gaya
ate jate hukumranon ne_adliya ko apne maqasid ke_leye istemal_karna chaha
arzi aur juzwaqti mafadat ke_leye mun_zor intezamiya hamesha adalti waqar se khelti rahi
jis tarha burro curacy mein apne hawari paida keye_gaye isi_tarha adliya mein ye sab_se bari badqismati rahi_hai
phele adwar mein isi_tarha hota_tha ke agar judge leye gaye hain to in mein se aki adh judge aesa ajata tha jis ki hamdardiyan ya wabastagiyan hoti thein

mazi ke tajurbat bataye hain ke ye judge bhi jab masnad e_adalat par beth jata_tha to amomi muhall ki_waja se is ki zaheni kefiyat phele jesi nahi rehti_thi aur_neek naami ki_khatir adala o insaf se nahi khelta tha

munasib tadat mein deyanatdar bakirdar aur khuaf e khuda rakhne_wale judges ki_kami hamesh hi aik masla rahi_hai lekin aj_kal jo kuch ho raha_hai i sne pore nizam_e adal_ki choleinholadi hain aur awam ka etemad adalaton se uthta jar_aha hai

agar kisi judge ki taqaruri par woqla ki anjumanon qumi akhbaraat ke sahafiyon aur bakhbar logon_ko kisi_tarha ka tajub uar heart na ho to wo shkhs theek_hai lekin agar kisi_shakhs ke taqarur par bar association ke dafatir mein qehqaye gunjane lagein sahafi_aur bakhabar log heart se aik_dosre ka mun dekhne lagen hata ke aam log bhi cha magoyan karne lagein to aesa judge yaqenan mayar par pora nahi utarta aur wo munsif bane ka ehel nahi

is_tarha ki taqarariyon aur intezamiya ke mafad parastana iqdat ne_adliya ke_idare ko shaded nuqsan phochya hai aur aaj halat ye ho_chuki hai ke adalaton ke eyanon mein aesi awazein aur sazishein nazar aney lagi hain jo aam kisim_ke sarkari daftaron ka khasa hoti hain
vote mustarad_kar deye_gaye
jin arkan ne apna_haq e_raidahi istamal nahi kiya in mein mulana azam tariq owees laghari raja khalid aur amanabbasi shamil han
blochistan subai_assembly ke memberas mein se ne apna_haq e_raidahi istamal kiya
muhammad_rafiq tarar_ne nawaz_sharif ki jila_watni tak bara aham kardar ada_kiya
is ke_bad june_ko general_parvez musharraf ne_unhen bhi sadar_e pakistan ke_uhde se farigh_kar diya aur khud sadar_e mumlikat ke_uhde par_faiz ho_gaye
bangladesh ke_founder sheikh mujeeb ur_rehman ki sahabzadi apni inteqami khou par qaboo_pane mien musalsal nakaam dikhai de rahi hain

miss_haseena wajid ne na_sirf tamam opposition jamaton ko dara dhamka kar_unhe qaid_o band mien rakh_kar unhe election ke amal se_bahar rakh_kar past ke parliamentary intekhabat mien kamiyabi_hasil kar_li hai
wo islam pasandon bil_khusoos jamaat islami ko dewaar se lagane ki_policy par bhi amal_peyra hain
mubsireen yeh sawal utha rahe_hain ke aaya haseena_wajid siyasi madbar politician hone ke_bawajood siyasi_mukhalfeen se is_qadar khaiyf kyun hain_lekin inhe is ka jawab nahi mil_raha hai
december mien jamat_e islami ke markazi rehnuma abdul_qadir ko phansi diye jane ke_bad yeh umeed ki ja_rahi thi ke haseena_wajid aur in ke sathiyon ka gussa qadre thanda ho_chukka ho_ga

lekin ab lag_raha hai ke jamat_e islami ke sala ameer maulana_mutee ur_rehman nizami samait aik darjan_se zaiyd aeham siyasi karkuno_ko phansi ki_saza suna kar bangladesh ko danista_taur par_tabahi ki_janib dhakela ja_raha hai

abdul_qadir ki_phansi par bangladesh ke siyasi aur_samaji halqon hatta ke zaraey_iblaagh ne bhi maslehatan khamoshi ikhteyar_kar rakhi_thi lekin taza sazaon ke faisle ke_bad zaraey_iblaagh ne bhi zaban khol di hai

bengali zaraey_iblaagh ne ab ki baar haseena_wajid ki_policy par karhi tanqeed karte_hue jamaat ke_sarbarah maulana_mutee urrehman nizami aur in ke_deegar sathiyon_ko saza e maut sunae jane ki khule alfaaz mien muzammat ki hai

siyasi samaji aur iblaaghi halqon ki_janib se miss_haseena wajid ko yeh mashwara_diya ja_raha hai ke wo apna zehni muaaiyna karaey kyun_ke jis qisam ki siyasi inteqami policy inho_ne apna rakhi hai wo kisi bhi soorat mien mulk o qaum ke mafaad mien nahi hai
opposition_ke musalsal aehtejaaj siyasi inarki aur haseena_wajid ki inteqami siyasat ke natijey mien maeshiyat badtareen tabahi se do_chaar hui hai
haseena_wajid ke iqdamaat ke_baiys gher jamhori quwwaton ko siyasat mien madakhlat ka_mauqa mil_sakta hai
bengali siyasat se ba khabar halqon ka_khayal hai ke haseena_wajid danista_taur par mulk ko fauj ke_hawale karne ki_sazish kar_rahi hain

agar inhe halaat ki nazakat ka mamooli sa bhi idraak ho to yeh_andaza lar lena chahiye ke agar ab ki baar fauj_ne iqtedar sambhala to haseena_wajid apni_zindagi ke baqiya ayyam mien siyasat ke qabil bhi nahi rahengi
unhen_kamiyab karane ke_leye panjab aur sindh ke wozra e_aala ne do mehfooz tareen nashistein khali karaein thein aur unhen_kamiyab karane ki zimedari qabol kit_hi
janab shaukat_azizne bhi hasbe riwayat bhohat wade waed keye intakhabi nare lagaye wahan ke awam_ko kuch khawab dekhaye lekin natija wohi dhak ke teen pat
wazir_e azam muntakheb hone ke_bad shaukat azizsahab ne aik_bar bhi us elaqe ka dorah nahi kiya

wazir_e azam_shaukat azizpar us_waqat qatilana hamla hoa jab wo abhi wazir_e azam nahi bane the yani wo aik intekhabi jalse se_khitab kar ke wapis lot rahe_the aur apni gari ke qareb phochne se chand lamhe phele aik zoordar damaka hoa aur wo bal bal bach gaye
ye aik khudkush hamla tha jis mein hamla_awar apne maqsad mein kamiyab_nahi ho_saka

mumkin hai esa hi hoa ho kyun_ke wazir_e azam_shaukat azizaksar o beshtar khzane ki tijoriyon ke bhare_hoye hone ka_dawa karte_the lekin ese bhare_hoye khazane ka kia faiedeha jo is mulik ke awam ke muan se roti ka akhari newala bhi cheen lene ke darpe ho

ho_sakta ha ke wazir_e azam_shaukat azizki apni mali position phele se bhetar hogai ho lekin un ke dor_e hukumat mein awam ki halat din_badin abtar hoti chali_ja rahi_hai aur log khudkushiyan karne par_majboor hen

september_ko jab panjub assembly ne perviz_musharaf ke donon uhde apne_pas rakhne ke_bare mein qarardad pass ki to ugle chand_roz mein wazir_e azam_shaukat azizne waze tor_par kha ke sadar ka wardi mein_rehna mm ke_sath kiye_gaye muhaide ki khilaf_warzi nahi
dosri_taraf awam ki halat ye hai ke un ke mun se roti ka akhiri niwala bhi chena ja_raha hai log berozgari aur bhook ke_hathon khud kushi karne par_majbor hain
insaf_ki farhami ki_sorat e_haal ye hai ke koi jaiz kaam bhi rishwat ke bagher hone ka tasawor bhi khatam_ho chukka_hai
mulik ka khazana bhara hoa hai lakin is ke samrat awam tak nahi phonche
awam_ko is bhare_hoye khgazane se kiya matlab jo un se do waqat ki roti bhi chen le
sabiq wazir_e azam_shaukat azizke dor_e hukumat mein cheeni ke_bad tareen bhoran paida howa

cheeni i ki_qemat rupe se bharh kar rupe tak ja phonchi wazir_e azam samet hukumati aehalkar cheeni ki market mein farhami par israr karte_rahe aur awam_ko indiya dete_rahe ke wo chini utility store se khariden
mulik_mein aese stores kitne hainawam ki bhari_aksariyat aam_dokanon se cheeni karedne pay majboor thi aur jin elaqon mein sarkari store the bhi to awam_ko waha bhi mushkilat ka_samna karna_para
utility_stores ki chini bhi mili bhaghat se aam_dokanon par farokhat hoti rahi aur logon_ko mehnghe damon milti rahi aur aj_tak mil_rahi hai
utility_stores par chini ki_qemat asal qemat se derah guna ziyadah thi is_baat ko hukumat danista nazar_andaz karti_rahi

hukumat ne sugar mil malikan ko qematein kam karne par_majbor nahi kiya balke neb ne tehqiqat karana chahi_to sadar perviz_musharaf ke humum par ise bhi rok deya_gaya kyun_ke is mein ba asar hukumati ehalkar mulavis the aur wazirati kursiyon par barjaman the
un ke_khilaf tehqiqat se hukumati dhanche par manfi_asrat muratab hone ka andesha tha
june ke akhir mein pakistan_steel mills_ki farokhat ke_silsile mein pakistan ki_tarikh ka sab_se bara maliyati scandle samne_aya jis mein supreme_court ko madakhlat karni pari
sirf ye hi nahi kesc ptcl ki_nijkari black cab tracketer zarinalit crislar aur railway coachon ke scandles ki baz ghasht bhi pore mulik_mein suna_di
kisi mamle mein transparanci nahi thi
commission aur kickback ka dor_dora raha quomi assase koriyon ke mol farokhat keye_gaye
supreme_court ke arkan par_mushtamil full_bench ne pakistan_steel mills_ki nijkari ko kaladam_qarar de_deya
is_tarha saal mein mukamal hone_wale sab_se bare sanati unit ko aik_ghante ki karwai mein farikhat kar_deya gaya
august_ko wazir_e azam_shaukat aziz ke_khilaf tehrik_e adam etimad jam karai gayi
is_notice mein wazir_e azam ke_khilaf nukat par_mushtamil charge_sheet tayar ki gayi_thi aur jis par opposition_ke kam_o besh_tamam arkan ke dastakhat the
charge_sheet ein kaha gaya_tha ke wazir_e azam pakistan_steel mills_ki privatization mein aain mein deye_gaye mandate aur privatization ke qawanin ki khilaf_warzi ke zimedar hain
is_notice mein mein stock_market corruption karne ke zimedar brockers ke_khilaf karwai na karne ka zimedar bhi wazir_e azam ko theraya gaya
chini semint gandum railway arazi scandal samit degar bezabtagiyon ki zimedari bhi wazir_e azam par dal de_gayi
august_ko ray shumari hoi_jis ke_natije mein tehrik_e adam_etemad nakam ho_gayi

apne khilaf_tehrik e_adam etemad_nakam hone ke_bad se le ka raj tak wazir_e azam_shaukat aziz gahe bagahe aur phele se_ziyadah shadomad ke_sath awam_ko adaad o_shumar ki bhol bholaiyon mein_masrof rakhe hoye hain aur zarebubadla ke_zakhair ki khushkhabriyan sunane ka_fariza anjam_de rahe_hain

mein jab fazal_ul haq ne muslim_league party ki_policy par_amal peyra na hote_hue defense council ki_rukniyat qabool_kar li aur bad mein mustafi hone se_inkaar kar_diya to us mauqey_par hussain_shaheed suhrawardy aur khuwaja nazim uddin ne unke_khilaf aik mahaz banaya_tha

august_ko jab muslim_league ne a_yom e_rast iqdaam a manaya to hindoun ne_calcutta mein musalmano ke khoon se holi kheli is mauqey_par bahesiyat wazeer_e aala apne tadbeer se fasadaat ki aag ko ziyada bharakne nahi diya
is mauqiff par quaid_e azam se un ke ikhtelafat itne barhe ke unho_ne hindustan mein sakonat ikhteyar_kar li aur kuch_arsey bad mein pakistan aa_gaey
lekin maah_bad dono_parties ke_darmiyan photo parh jane se jab bohran paida_hua to hussain_shaheed suhrawardy mustafee ho_gaye aur assembly_mein hazb e_ikhtelaf ka_kirdar adaa_karne lage
jin ka marshal_law hukkam ke_paas koi_jawab na tha
hussain_shaheed suhrawardy_ne december_ko marshal_law ke zehni sadmey_se wafaat_paai aur dhaka mein madfan hue
ye_azaz bhi abhi_tak pakistan sirf_aik dafa hi hasil karsaka
in per ilzam hai kay woh lord godrey white ki_beti seeta white ki_beti kay_walid hai jab kay imran_khan hamesha say iss ilzam ki tarwed karte aye hain
june_ko iss jore mein talaq_ho gayi
imran_khan ka_kehna tha kay woh apni masrof zindagi ki_wajah say inhein waqt nahi dey patey thay
november_ko pervez_musharraf kay emergence kay nafaz kay alan kay_baad app_ko nazar_band karne ki_koshish ki gai ta_hum app police ko jul dey kar_farar hone mein kamiyab hogaye
november_ko police nay_inhein giraftar karliya

iss say phele woh may ko chief_justice of_pakistan justice_muhammad iftikhar_chaudhry ki really per karachi mein hone_wali fairing aur iss nateje_mein hone_wali halakato ka_ilzam muttahida_qaumi movement per laga chukey thay

imran_khan nay_kaha kay in ki zindagi aur karachi mein tehrek e insaf kay karkun ki zindagi khatra lahaq hai khun_kay britannia hukumat_nay muttahida_qaumi movement_kay london mein muqeem quaid altaf_hussain kay_khalaf qadam nahi_uthaya jis say ye log shair ho kar tashadut ki karwai kar saktey hain

interview kay_zariye awam ki nigha mein rahey_hain ta_hum mubasireen_ka kehna_hai kay in kay pass khatir khuwah vote bank aur street power moujud nahi aur ayinda intakhabat_mein bhi in kay kamiyabi honey ka_imkan kuch zada nahi hai
pir_ali rashdi_ne march_ko wafaat_paai
ke hungama khaiz daur aur bilkhusoos zulfiqar_ali bhutto ki_phansi ke_bad wo khamoshi aur maslehat ka_shikaar dikhaai diye
general_zia ul_haq ke taweel marshal_law mein wo apna koi mustaqil siyasi raasta na chunn sake
general_zia ul_haq ke iqtedar ke khatmey ne in ki siyasi chupp ka roza torh_diya aur wo batadreej siyasi taur_par mutehrik hote gae

mohtarma_benazir bhutto ke pehle daur_e hukomat mein islami nazariyati council ke chairman bane ke election se_pehle wo mohtarma_benazir bhutto ke sathiyon mein shumar hone_lage the afsoos ke in ki zindagi ne_wafa na ki wagarna shayad_wo ke_bad dobara koi hukomati auhda paa lete
march_ko is hasht pehlo shakhsiyat ne daarfani_se kooch kia

maulana_kausar niazia mianwali ke mardam khaiz khittey se_talluq rakhte_the jahan ki niazi baradari ke_naamwar afraad maslan general a k niazi maulana abdul_sattar khan_niazi aur imraan khan_niazi ki shohrat mein koi kalaam nahi lekin_yeh sab he pur_josh log apni_zindagi ke mukhtalif adwaar mein shadeed tanqeed_ka nishana bhi bane
kausar_niazia bunyadi_taur par mazhabi class ne in ke is_jurm ko kabhi muaaf_nahi kiya aur wo hamesha right baazo ka khaas nishana bane rahe is shadeed nafrat ne in ke_urooj ka_raasta rook diya
dosri_taraf peoples_party ke bohat se log bhi inhe hamesha rujat pasand mulla samajhte rahe
peoples_party ke bohat se logon ne inhe apni saffon mein hamesha shukk ki nazar se dekha
maulana_kausar niazi hamari siyasi tareekh ke wo aadmi_the jinho_ne mehaz_apni salahiyat aur mehnat se aik maqam banaya magar wo zaati_hesiyat mein khatir_khuwa awami maqboliyat_hasil na kar_sake

kuch halqon_mein in ke_barey mein paae jane_wale tassub nafrat aur hassad ne in ke siyasi qad shairana maqam aur ilmi rutbey ke_hawale se dewarein khari kar den wagarna aaj shayad_wo shiddat_pasandon ke_khilaaf aitedaal pasand mazhabi quwwaton ke_fikri rehnuma hote aur liberal powers ke_liye aik ideal mazhabi rehnumaa magar taqdeer ke_faisley alag he hote_hain
saadgi aur kifayat shoaari sari_umar in ka shuaar raha lekin siyasi aur qaumi kamon_mein apna paisa be dareegh kharsh kiya
angrez khilafat_tehreek ke_bad tareen mukhalif the
seth chotani ko_angrezon ne apni resha dawaniyon aur sarkari aehkamat ke_zariye dewaliya kar_diya aur wo is sadmey_se is_daarfani se_kooch kar_gaey

inho_ne liyari ke logon_ko basane ke_liye villages basane ka_mansooba pesh_kiya aur village namone ke taur_par tameer karne ke_liye apni janib_se lakh hazar rupey ki raqam pesh ki lekin baldiya is se istefada na kar_saki
angrezon_ne apni_makhsoos hikmat_e amli ke_tehat sindh ko bombay ke_sath mila diya_tha
